instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1932: What is A1932? A1932 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Late 2018, 2019 with EMC 3184, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01521..
definitions.A1707: What is A1707? A1707 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Late 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3072, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00281, 820-00928..
definitions.A1708: What is A1708? A1708 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2017, 2016 with EMC 3164, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00840, 820-00875..

threads.title: MacBook Air 2018 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> restore error 1008F and external boot is locked
threads.message:
Hi,

I have an <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> machine here that does not boot to OS. Recovery gives an error: 1008F and external boot is locked. What is my best solution? 

Thank you for your help!

threads.title: MacBook Air 2018 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> restore error 1008F and external boot is locked
MacBook Air 2018 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> restore error 1008F and external boot is locked
threads.message: Not yet but I was thinking about it and hoping that maybe there is another solution. For DFU restore do I need the same <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> model or <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> and <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> will do too?

threads.title: MacBook Air 2018 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1932</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> restore error 1008F and external boot is locked
threads.message: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>/8 should work, but must have Catalina installed...
